title: Product of Conjugates Pattern
text: We compare our expression to the product of conjugates pattern formula: $$\left(a-b\right) \left(a+b\right)=a^2-b^2$$.
speech: We compare our expression to the product of conjugates pattern formula:  parentheses a minus b,  times, parentheses a plus b,  is equal to, a squared minus b squared .
pacedSpeech: We compare our expression to the product of conjugates pattern formula:    a minus b,  times,  a plus b,  is equal to, a squared minus b squared

title: Compare the Binomials\n
speech: parentheses a minus b,  times, parentheses a plus b,  \n parentheses c minus 5,  times, parentheses c plus 5,
pacedSpeech: a minus b,  times,  a plus b,

title: Identify a
text: What is a in the expression?
speech: What is a in the expression?

title: Identify $$b$$
speech: What is  b  in the expression?

title: Plug in the Terms
text: Substitute $$a=c$$ and $$b=5$$ into the product of conjugates pattern formula:\n$$\left(a-b\right) \left(a+b\right)=a^2-b^2$$\n$$\left(c-5\right) \left(c+5\right)=c^2-5^2$$
speech: Substitute  a is equal to c  and  b, is equal to 5  into the product of conjugates pattern formula:\n parentheses a minus b,  times, parentheses a plus b,  is equal to a squared minus b squared \n parentheses c minus 5,  times, parentheses c plus 5,  is equal to, c squared minus 5 squared
